data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Bilbao at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Bilbao are caught offside.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Alaves drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bilbao close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Bilbao in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 8, Important block from the Bilbao defence as Deyverson fires in a strike for Alaves.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Alaves to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Alaves.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Bilbao.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a throw-in for Bilbao, close to Alaves's area.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Alaves.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Bilbao's Dani Garcia has been booked in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Throw-in for Alaves close to the penalty box.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Bilbao needs to be cautious. Alaves have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 24, Can Alaves capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bilbao's half?
Ximo Navarro for Alaves gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Bilbao have a dangerous throw-in.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Bilbao.
In the minute 27, Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
Throw-in for Bilbao at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 29, Bilbao's Inaki Williams has run offside.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Bilbao throw-in in Alaves's half.
At Estadio de Mendizorroza, Bilbao are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 32, Throw-in high up the field for Bilbao in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Bilbao.
Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Alaves.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 36, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Alaves a goal kick.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Alaves throw-in in Bilbao's half.
Alaves needs to be cautious. Bilbao have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Alaves's half?
Bilbao's Raul Garcia gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the home team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Bilbao.
Alaves have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Bilbao close to the penalty box.
Free kick Bilbao.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
In the minute 44, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Alaves to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
The home team have replaced Deyverson with Lucas Perez. This is the first substitution made today by Pablo Machin.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Play has been interrupted briefly in Vitoria-Gasteiz to check on Yuri Berchiche, who is grimacing with pain.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team has substituted Yuri Berchiche with Mikel Balenziaga. Gaizka Garitano is thus making his first change.
In the minute 50, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 52, Joselu (Alaves) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Victor Laguardia is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
In the minute 56, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a throw-in for Bilbao, close to Alaves's area.
Victor Laguardia is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 58, Edgar Mendez's header is off-target for Alaves.
Goal kick for Bilbao at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, The away team replace Oihan Sancet with Iker Muniain.
Gaizka Garitano (Bilbao) is making a third substitution, with Jon Morcillo replacing Inigo Cordoba.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Alaves a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Alaves.
Bilbao's Raul Garcia breaks free at Estadio de Mendizorroza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Alaves have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Alaves.
Bilbao will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Alaves.
Unai Nunez (Bilbao) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal kick for Bilbao at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 64, Inigo Martinez is booked for the away team.
In the minute 65, Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
Rodrigo Ely is replacing Victor Laguardia for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
In the minute 67, Bilbao are pushing forward but Ander Capa's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Alaves in the half of Bilbao.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Mikel Balenziaga is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 73, Mikel Balenziaga returns to the field for Bilbao after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick in a good position for Alaves!
Goal! Rodrigo Ely heads Alaves into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 74, Great play from Lucas Perez to set up the goal.
Alaves are coming forward and Ruben Duarte gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Bilbao a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Alaves make their third substitution with Manu Garcia replacing Tomas Pina.
Joselu (Alaves) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Alaves advance rapidly upfield but Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez blows for offside.
In the minute 78, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Bilbao.
Throw-in Alaves.
Gaizka Garitano is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio de Mendizorroza with Alex Berenguer replacing Unai Lopez.
In the minute 79, Asier Villalibre is on a sub for Inaki Williams for Bilbao.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the away team a throw-in.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Bilbao throw-in in Alaves's half.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Alaves.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Ruben Duarte (Alaves) has received a yellow card from Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
In the minute 86, Free kick Bilbao.
Ruben Duarte in Alaves has been yellow-carded a second time by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez and is being sent off.
Raul Garcia (Bilbao) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 88, Alaves have a goal kick.
Alaves needs to be cautious. Bilbao have an attacking throw-in.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Bilbao at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Throw-in Alaves.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Throw-in for Bilbao close to the penalty box.
Alaves have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Pablo Machin (Alaves) is making a fourth substitution, with Javi Lopez replacing Edgar Mendez.
